content: Hello, project-portable-simd was discussing and decided to take up temporary maintenance of packed_simd since its current status has been causing ecosystem breakage. I did a bunch of work only to realize I don't have auth to actually cargo publish the patch release. I was told to contact infra to ask if this can be fixed! So here I am! Can this be fixed? :sweat_smile:
@Jubilee hmm, gnzlbg is the sole owner of that crate :/
aaaaa
cc @gnzlbg

I am surprised that rust-lang has a repo in its org namespace that doesn't have assignable crates.io rights, I naively thought that the ownership rights were in rust-lang org hands somewhere and not individually allocated. Part of the problem is that I was the first person to touch it in ~10 months.
it's an oversight, we usually don't realize
I mean we never did an audit nor enforce if that's actually the case
let me add that to the endless pile of infra things to improve :(
FWIW, if you decide to change that policy, let me know and I'd be happy to add some infra user to libz-sys.
wonder if rust-bus (https://users.rust-lang.org/t/bus-factor-1-for-crates/17046) could be something we use for such crates
@DPC I don't know how official that is. I think whatever infra user/team is used should be official and controlled by infra.
@Josh Triplett add https://github.com/rust-lang-owner to the crate
it's our "root" github account
@Pietro Albini cargo owner --add rust-lang-owner ?
I think that's it
Invited. Can you confirm if rust-lang-owner got an invite, and accept it?
received it
will accept it in a bit
@Josh Triplett accepted it!
Confirmed. Thanks for handling this!
I don't want any crate under rust-lang to have continuity issues.

Where do we currently keep written policies regarding the rust-lang organization? I'd be happy to submit a PR adding a note that anything under rust-lang should have rust-lang-owner as one of its owners.
I need to check if mdbook has the same or not
we don't, will add it :smile:
forge.rust-lang.org
@Pietro Albini Just did the same thing for git2-rs.
@Josh Triplett thanks! accepted
I am glad to see this will not happen for any more crates at least. :sweat_smile: I guess I will publish packed_simd_2
@Jubilee have you tried contacting gnzlbg?
There have been multiple prior attempts to get gnzlbg's attention, yes.

I am sure there is a more intense level of escalation in terms of attempts to contact I could take but frankly I am not sure what is appropriate, in the end, for escalation here. Like... socially appropriate. At some point it gets creepy.
FYI pinging on the Zulip won't work unless the pinged person is subscribed to the stream.
